name: Snake VS Pacman
description:
Two legends from the ancient times of gaming history are back to decide who is the best!

The battle takes place on Pacman's home turf - will this give him advantage, or will Snake use that maze against him? Find out!

Controls: Snake - WASD, Pacman - arrows. It's possible to play HUMAN VS CPU, or let the CPUs play against each other.

Currently fullscreen is not working, but you can press F11 and zoom in as you need.
